* Integrated temperature characteristic with multi thread implementation. Priority below normal with update every 1 second

@{5dd2b78fa20e0c0e9ef6b75d} FYI: 

commit [https://bitbucket.org/arolgroup/j0664-ns2-firmware/commits/df82ef10b5addd570ac4b45df80dd7e1e95816d6](https://bitbucket.org/arolgroup/j0664-ns2-firmware/commits/df82ef10b5addd570ac4b45df80dd7e1e95816d6) 

fails to build when executing “”:

Commands:

```
git describe --tags
pio -e release
```

@Gianluca Teti FYI:

commit https://bitbucket.org/arolgroup/j0664-ns2-firmware/commits/df82ef10b5addd570ac4b45df80dd7e1e95816d6

fails to build when executing “”:

Commands:

git describe --tags
pio -e release

Result:

vscode ➜ /workspaces/j0664-ns2-firmware (integration) $ git describe --tags

vscode ➜ /workspaces/j0664-ns2-firmware (integration) $ pio run -e release
Processing release (platform: nordicnrf52@9.5.0;
